data.text: @PeterOfPerth @SAHealth The list as died with covid if you die within 28 days but there are no stats for dying within 28 days of vaccination. Why ? Most recently, Shane Warne - doctor knows but has not mentioned if boosted for Thai travel.  Says bad diet, ??

@SAHealth The new cases are increasing steadily, as are the number of deaths. So this is the signal for us to remove all restrictions ? I would have thought that we patiently keep the restrictions that are most effective, viz. masks, SD and crowd avoidance, while the medical boys help out

@PeterOfPerth @Anthony40432979 @SAHealth True given how little they understand about the latest data. Many are saying it shows the vax kills 3% who have it. That alone would have killed 600k in Australia. That's 4 times out all cause mortality annually. In 2021 we only had 160 deaths like we normally do

@mpc_xetts @Anthony40432979 @SAHealth Yes the side effects would have to be horrible to deny use given the efficacy. Problem may have been if the data had been released then the anti vaxxers would have gone ballistic
@RealYowie @SAHealth Every day in SA the unvaxxed and vaxx status unknown is about 50%. Huge sample size. WA tracking exactly the same with just over 100 hospitalisations.
@PeterOfPerth @Anthony40432979 @SAHealth Yes the FDA should explain their decision. However I don't believe this latest data suggest on a safety aspect their decision was wrong

@PeterOfPerth @SAHealth I dont think you have had enough to think.

What is the breakdown over a larger sample size?

@mpc_xetts @Anthony40432979 @SAHealth The clinical use data was not released. The FDA now need to justify why full authorisation was given and why the data was withheld.  Not saying they did anything wrong. Iâ€™m no expert. What is undeniable is the efficacy of the vaccines albeit with side effects
@mpc_xetts @Anthony40432979 @SAHealth Authorised for emergency use in late 2020. Given full approval in August 2021, presumably based on the clinical results of using it.
